thread.title: Mr. & Mrs. Williams
thread.title_full: Oshawa Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Mr. & Mrs. Williams

author: Mr. & Mrs. Williams
title: Mr. & Mrs. Williams
text: We have actually already recommended to our friends, and they did purchase an area rug from this store. Fast and efficient service, great installers. My husband has already phoned the store to thank them. They were happy to get a complimentary call.
